name: Germs Galore
description:
Germie is a happy germ living on his burger until his home gets eaten by an unknowing human. With only his bare... cell, Germie struggles to escape from the  humans "Out of control" immune system.

Germs Galore is a (hopefully fun) puzzle game about a germ called Germie :D although the art style may be ugly (i can't draw :p) i hope the game is still fun!

i might make a level editor after the jam is done :o

if there are any glitches, just press the Restart Level button. (its the best i could do with the time that we had)

ps. if something is wrong with the  game, please tell me, i'll try and fix it.

enjoy!
